message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I'm willing to compromise!
Your offer was a bit too lopsided for me.  How about we meet closer to the middle? This is a good deal before inflation eats into the value.
I see you want to meet in the middle, but I think I can do a bit better. How about 57-43?
We're running out of time, and the money is losing value fast. This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
